name: James Boehmer
tagline: Battle-hardened full-stack engineer, architect, and manager
body:
### TL;DR

I am a battle-hardened full-stack engineer, architect, and manager. I have the ability to produce creative and innovative solutions rapidly which are highly scalable, service-oriented, and have a focus on distributed cloud computing, big data, and continuous delivery. Specialties: Search, metadata, Amazon AWS, RESTful web services, NoSQL, scalability, concurrency, high availability.

I am looking for an opportunity to drive the creation of new technology products, while managing a team of engineers.

### Summary

I have a Masters in Information Systems from Stevens Institute, and a bachelors in Computer Science from Stony Brook.  For 4 years, I managed Search technology for The New York Times.  Prior to that, I worked with Geographic Information Systems at Verizon Wireless, building internal tools for the Network Repair Bureau, RF engineers, and the Network Operations Center.  I am presently the Head of Engineering for a startup in the fintech space.

### My Recent Projects

- The Times Machine: spatial- and search-enabled NYT archive browser - [http://timesmachine.nytimes.com](http://timesmachine.nytimes.com)
- NYT Site Search: Elasticsearch-powered, relevance scores beat Google - [http://query.nytimes.com/search/sitesearch/](http://query.nytimes.com/search/sitesearch/)
- NYT Collections and Times Topics: Metadata/search-driven - [http://www.nytimes.com/column/modern-love](http://www.nytimes.com/column/modern-love), [http://topics.nytimes.com/top/news/international/countriesandterritories/china](http://topics.nytimes.com/top/news/international/countriesandterritories/china)
- Quire equity crowdfunding portal - [https://quire.com/](https://quire.com/)
- Twocents: A stand-alone in-memory weighted prefix autosuggest/autocomplete service written in Go - [https://github.com/jamesboehmer/twocents](https://github.com/jamesboehmer/twocents)
- Tributary: Stream real time search queries from nytimes.com - [http://jamesboehmer.github.io/tributary](http://jamesboehmer.github.io/tributary)
- NYTD2013: A presentation on using the New York Times Article Search API - [http://jamesboehmer.github.io/nytd2013/](http://jamesboehmer.github.io/nytd2013/), [http://jamesboehmer.github.io/nytd2013/portal](http://jamesboehmer.github.io/nytd2013/portal)

### Links

- LinkedIn - [https://www.linkedin.com/in/jamesboehmer](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jamesboehmer)
- Github - [https://github.com/jamesboehmer](https://github.com/jamesboehmer)
- Twitter - [https://twitter.com/jamesboehmer](https://twitter.com/jamesboehmer)
